function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in the range of local snail host due to changes in the marshland ecosystem and sociodemographic shifts","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-emergence of the disease due to the completion of the three gorges dam","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Annual reinfection of up to 20% of people due to occupational risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bureaucratic and institutional inflexibility leading to lack of tailored approaches","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on the impact of community-based approaches on epidemiological trends and cost-effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in enacting mitigation efforts in the absence of epidemics and high numbers of human cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for capacity building at multiple levels for effective community-based interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainties in modeling efforts for policy design and programmatic orientation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of incorporation of community-based approaches and diverse issues in vbd strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate response to global commitments in addressing vbd scenarios","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of political will and funding for scale-up of disease prevention and control tools","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenge in scaling-up, financing, and institutionalizing community empowerment approaches to vector-borne diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for modification of existing guidelines and plans to incorporate participatory planning and intersectoral collaboration","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient dissemination of the empowerment approach to government decision-makers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of empowerment principles","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to organizational change at the management level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Local adaptive capacity may not be sufficient to contain the spread of contagious diseases in diverse contexts.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited attempts to scale up local approaches for disease containment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate link between research, policy, and action in real-time.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective npi implementation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of trust in public health actions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of culturally-relevant risk communication strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of trust and transparency leading to public disengagement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental
